code: import React from'react';import{Container,Row,Col}from'reactstrap';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import tshirts from'../../shared/shirts';import classes from'./TShirtsPage.module.css';import appRoutes from'../../shared/appRoutes';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var TShirtsPage=function TShirtsPage(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:classes.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:classes.title,children:"Our T-shirts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:classes.row,children:tshirts.map(function(shirt){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{tag:Link,to:"".concat(appRoutes.tshirts,"/").concat(shirt.name),lg:4,md:6,sm:12,className:classes.shirtCard,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:shirt.colors.white.front}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.name,children:shirt.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.available,children:["Available in ",Object.keys(shirt["colors"]).length," colors"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:classes.button,children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"See Page"})]})]},shirt.name);})})]});};export default TShirtsPage;
